todoList.title: TO DO list using TDD
todoList.desc: I tried to apply TDD in the company, but I was not able to apply it directly due to a structural problems. So, I applied TDD that I heard a lot while developing it to my TO DO list.

portfolio.title: Portfolio
portfolio.desc: It's a portfolio that introduces me, and I've tried to look pretty by applying a style that I haven't used well. Also, I've applied it by supporting multiple languages with i18n so that it can be seen in English.
